entry.title: Of Spire & Throne - Cascading Shard - lyric

link.title: Of Spire & Throne - Cascading Shard - lyric

entry.content:
opposing wounds cascade
torn from their weakness
grains of sand colliding
to smother shifting depths
lost in their swallowing
to writhe
in reflection of this
broken body sinking
submit to the unclean
threat immoveable
execrating shadows
behold the incessant
wielding of the image
threat in confliction
shard fall upon flesh
revealed against light
purify reflection
barrier for resolve

entry.title: Of Spire & Throne - Legacy - lyric
entry.content:
in sorrow recurring
reveal the form submerged
beholding a solemn truth
summoned to atone
flesh wrought in glass
the weight of doubt
in tears of strength
memories fade and return
flesh reflects
fragile vision
glass conceals
in drought
illusion
